sn20.8:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
sn20.8:2.1: “Kalingarupadhana, bhikkhave, etarahi licchavi viharanti appamatta atapino upasanasmim.
sn20.8:2.2: Tesam raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto na labhati otaram na labhati arammanam.
sn20.8:2.3: Bhavissanti, bhikkhave, anagatamaddhanam licchavi sukhumala mudutalunahatthapada
sn20.8:2.4: te mudukasu seyyasu tulabibbohanasu yavasuriyuggamana seyyam kappissanti.
sn20.8:2.5: Tesam raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto lacchati otaram lacchati arammanam.
sn20.8:3.1: Kalingarupadhana, bhikkhave, etarahi bhikkhu viharanti appamatta atapino padhanasmim.
sn20.8:3.2: Tesam maro papima na labhati otaram na labhati arammanam.
sn20.8:3.3: Bhavissanti, bhikkhave, anagatamaddhanam bhikkhu sukhuma mudutalunahatthapada.
sn20.8:3.4: Te mudukasu seyyasu tulabibbohanasu yavasuriyuggamana seyyam kappissanti.
sn20.8:3.5: Tesam maro papima lacchati otaram lacchati arammanam.
